text: Hi, I’m Dylana from DealEdge.  To start, could you please share your full name?
Have you ever operated in a private equity-backed company? Feel free to mention the sponsor name, fund, or deal context if applicable.
Have you been involved in any company exits such as IPOs, acquisitions, or recapitalizations?
What size companies have you worked with in terms of revenue size? (e.g., 100mil ~ 200mil)
Are there particular industries or domains where you’ve spent the majority of your operating career?
What areas of the business have you most frequently led — for example, go-to-market, finance, operations, or engineering?
Looking ahead, what roles are you most interested in exploring next — such as CEO, CFO, Operating Partner, or Board Director?
That’s all for now — thank you for sharing your background. We’ll follow up with any next steps. Take care!
